# identifier

**Instance Property**

The unique BSD name of this network interface.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

BSD names for the host computer’s Ethernet interfaces include `en0`, `en1`, and so on.

## Getting the interface description

- **localizedDisplayName**: A user-visible name for the network interface.

items.description: A user-visible name for the network interface.
